 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלְיָה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==fat tail of sheep==, still accounted a delicacy in the East; (Mishna ***id.*** [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלְיְתָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלִּיתָא‎</span>, etc.; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, compare [[BDB#Fl|Fl]]<sup>TWB i. 418 a</sup>) [[Exod.29.22|Exod 29:22]]; [[Lev.3.9|Lev 3:9]]; [[Lev.7.3|Lev 7:3]]; [[Lev.8.25|Lev 8:25]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵ֫לֶב‎</span>); [[Lev.9.19|Lev 9:19]], probably also [[1Sam.9.24|1Sam 9:24]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעָלֶיהָ‎</span> see [[BDB#Gei|Gei]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] (compare [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>Nat. Hist. Bib. ch. vi</sup> [[BDB#Ri|Ri]]<sup>HWB Schafe</sup> [[BDB#Smith|Smith]]<sup>Dict. Bib. Sheep</sup>).
